history.proof: induction n as [|n' IH]. -- intros H. exists 0. exists 0. split. ++ reflexivity. ++ sfirstorder depth: 3. -- intros H. destruct (IH H) as [q [r [H1 H2]]]. destruct (d - r =? 1) eqn:E. ++ exists (S q). exists 0. split. ** simpl. rewrite H1. rewrite Nat.add_0_r. hauto lb: on depth: 3. ** qsimpl time: 1. ++ exists q. exists (S r). split. ** rewrite H1. rewrite Nat.add_succ_r. auto. ** hauto lb: on depth: 3.

original: induction n as [|n' IH]. -- intros H. exists 0. exists 0. split. ++ reflexivity. ++ auto with arith. -- intros H. destruct (IH H) as [q [r [H1 H2]]]. destruct (d - r =? 1) eqn:E. ++ exists (S q). exists 0. split. ** simpl. rewrite H1. simpl. rewrite Nat.add_0_r. auto. ** apply Nat.lt_0_succ. ++ exists q. exists (S r). split. ** simpl. rewrite H1. simpl. rewrite Nat.add_succ_r. auto. ** apply Nat.lt_trans with (m := d). ** auto. ** apply Nat.lt_succ_diag_r.
